#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
 
vector<ll> v[100005];
ll mod = 1000000007;
ll fact[100005];
ll dist[100005];
ll perm[100005];
bool visited[100005];
ll start;
ll t,n,a,b;
 
void dfs(ll s,int ht){
	visited[s] = true;
	dist[s] = ht+1;
	for(ll i=0;i<v[s].size();i++){
		if(!visited[v[s][i]]){
			dfs(v[s][i],dist[s]);
		}
	}
}
 
void factcal(){
	fact[0] = 1;
	
	for(ll i=1;i<100003;i++){
		fact[i] = i*fact[i-1];
		fact[i] %= mod;
	}
}
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	factcal();
	
	while(t--){

		scanf("%lld",&n);
			
		for(ll i=0;i<=n;i++){
			v[i].clear();
			visited[i] = false;
			dist[i] = 0;
			perm[i] = 0;
		}
		
		for(ll i=1;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
			v[a].push_back(b);
			v[b].push_back(a);
		}
		
		scanf("%lld",&start);
		//dfs(start,-1);

		ll ans = 1;
		for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++){
			ll temp = v[i].size()-1;
			if(temp==0) continue;
			if(i==start)
				temp++;
			
			ll tmp = fact[temp];
			ans *= tmp;
			ans %= mod;
		}
		

		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	
	}
	
	return 0;
}
